Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Greggy
Reviews.Content: excellent camerazoom is very good, can take photos of the moon and get some detail of the moon craters.ISO6400 has minimal noise.I have yet to test this in the outdoors during daytime.Beach Camera delivers fast and they attend to your needs or inquiries well.Everything in the picture was included even though they weren't mentioned in the details.the SD card reader does not seem to work but this is still a very good value bundle.They included a Sony  SD card, a cleaning kit, an extra battery, a tripod and a nice camera bag for the Canon SX50.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love the Canon SX50 HS!
Reviews.Author: texasFox
Reviews.Content: I think I've had the camera about a month. I spent 3 or 4 days reading the manual. The 50X zoom is amazing; I can nearly take a photo of an individual feather on the birds at my feeders 3 feet outside my window. This camera has so many more features than the camera I replaced that I'm in awe; 6400 max ISO, 12mp for starters. Some features I've tried out but not had an opportunity to use on a regular basis. One feature I love is the color swap: select a color to replace, select a color to substitute, indicate how close the match to the replacement color has to be, and the substitution shows up when you're framing the shot. The panorama was a little more tedius to use than I expected, but my old camera didn't have panorama, so I imagine I'll get used to it soon. I like the backlighting feature/mode. Continuous shoot mode is so fast. It even has focus bracketing. It will take me a while to be able to use most of the features without refering to the manual, but I so love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Canon sx50 with camer kit
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks! The photo bag and kit are junk. The 4 inch tripod is ridiculous and the camera barely fits into the bag with room for NOTHING else

Reviews.Title: Good package...but it could be better
Reviews.Author: FatherLee
Reviews.Content: The Camera is good, nice long, super zoom, which is why I bought it.  The build quality is good, but the picture quality could be better.  I guess DSLR is the next step but that is such a big step up.The memory card was okay, the battery was okay, the tripod is useless for such a heavy camera with a long lense.  The camera bag is also useless, too bulky.Overall, a good package.  Just don't expect your photos to be outstanding, especially in low light, long zoom.

Reviews.Title: Just returned from The Holy Lands
Reviews.Author: John Murphy "glass top"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for Hummingbird Pictures and a trip to the Holy Lands. I think my cameras Auto feature sold several in our group on the trip. We went to Petra In Jordan. I was able to take pictures for other people in our group that no one else could get. This camera is Light Flexible and the 50X zoom is amazing. Shots taken at full Zoom are very clear, I wish I could post some I tookIf what you want is a Quality and yes a little expensive , but worth it to me, Point and shoot this is it. The Battery lasted a full day. With all the zoom in and out I did not expect that long of life.  I did get an extra battery  so I always had a spare. I bought the 32 gig Simms Chip shot 1500 pictures for a total of  4.9 gig so I was never in danger of running out of space. The charger also works on 240v , Need the prong adapter only, so it would fully charge the battery in one hour

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Disapointed "VHA"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great and the zoom.... wow, I took many wonderful pictures using it but the most amazing picture was a picture of the waning moon, seems like if I was there, the shadows of the craters.... it's a very good camera, even in the night.

Reviews.Title: Canon SX50
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Weirick "old man"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this SX50 specifically for a safari in Tanzania.  It was the best decision.  The 50X optical zoom with the stabilization worked excellently.  Got great pictures of animals and birds (Audubon quality).  At maximum zoom, including digital, filled the screen with a rhino a quarter mile away.  Pictures are clear, colorful and sharp.  The only disappointment was scenery where there was some fog.  Probably need to add a filter for these situations.  So small and compact compared to an SLR with enormous lens to get same results.

Reviews.Title: Best point and shoot on the market
Reviews.Author: Stephen Young "geezerdog"
Reviews.Content: Compared the camera with several others, including a Nikon in the same price range my daughter owns. The lens is awesome, giving clear shots out to 150 yards, as well as very good focus up close. The camera bundle I got was what sold it- I'd rate a 32 gig chip as necessary. Works well in relatively low light conditions. I got clear pictures of Elk and a Moose right after sunrise, without full light. What I didn't like was the charger was not designed for use in a car- I had to buy one separate for travel, though not expensive. Also the little tripod is more a toy than anything useful. I had trouble finding the righ shoe to fit my tripod, even though its a universal. You need a 2nd battery for sure- I got less than 100 shots per battery, not a problem if you have one to change to. For the money a great camera. The bundle from Amazon is well worth the expenditure. If they included an auto battery charger, it would be 4.5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Lots of bells and whistles!
Reviews.Author: John "JRC"
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures. I am still learning all of its features. The telephoto is awesome and the macro is hard to believe.

Reviews.Title: Quality Product
Reviews.Author: Michael Sova
Reviews.Content: We had an inexpensive Kodak Playsport which shot great video and fairly low quality still shots.  Overall, we were quite happy with the camera until it simply stopped working.  There was no warning.  One day we had a camera.  The next day we had a really slick looking paper weight.  I know know that, if you own that particular camera, a sudden critical battery failure is a question of when not if.  So, it was time for something new.  We looked at other similarly inexpensive models but decided it was time for an upgrade.  The reviews on the Cannon were excellent so we decided to give it a try.  I should also point out that Amazon offered the best price by far.  Bottom line, all the good reviews you read are spot on.  The reason we gave this camera four stars instead of five was because of two minor design flaws.  First, if you take a still shot while shooting video, you can hear the click on the video.  That seems to be the case even if the sound functions are turned off.  Maybe there's a way around that.  If so, we haven't figured it out yet.  In addition, taking a stillshot while shooting video will make the video frame briefly freeze and go black.  We haven't found a way around that one either.  Really, our only other complaint (and that's really too strong of a word) is that there's a lot to learn.  This camera has a lot of functions and features and is not designed for the beginner.  A quick start manual comes with the camera.  The real manual is a pdf file totally a few hundred pages.  Expect a bit of a learning curve.  We did find some very helpful instructional video on YouTube.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for travel
Reviews.Author: L. C. Chien
Reviews.Content: Nice camera with the zoom power to take good quality photos and movies even in the low lighting condition.The power of battery discharged within 2 hours for taking photos without flash.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot camera for nature watching.
Reviews.Author: Donald L Gayman
Reviews.Content: I am a beginner bird watcher and find this camera to be just what I needed.  It is light enough to carry everywhere I walk, hike, boat, or bicycle and gets great pictures using the auto setting.  It literally only requires you to point, zoom, and shoot to obtain very clear photos of birds which don't hold still for more than a few seconds.

Reviews.Title: Delivers what it promises
Reviews.Author: alwhit34
Reviews.Content: I like the camera and all its features. It delivers what it promises, I can't say I love it because a few things bother me but I'll learn to live with them. One of the problems I have is the control function wheel on the back. It seems I'm always accidentally activating the Self Timer button with the base of my thumb....either my thumb is too big...or the wheel is not recessed enough. The other thing is purely cosmetic......body material feels so cheap. Other than that, my photos have been better than expected. I shot the moon the other night and the detail of the craters and valleys were great at 1200mm.

Reviews.Title: Camera is excellent
Reviews.Author: Rebecca L Smith
Reviews.Content: We were hesitant to replace our current camera because we loved it so much and it was so simple (point and shoot, Nikon).  This camera far exceeds my expectations... the far zoom is incredible (used to to take pics across a football field at the players and could get waist up shots with resolution such that we could see the emotions on their faces.  Incredible!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: G. S. J.
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I had to return the camera because the USB port from the camera to the computer wasn't functioning.  Other than that I was extremely happy with the camera.  I got a couple shots of the moon that showed an amazing amount of detail.  The 50x zoom is amazing.  Also, it was a great bundle, included everything except the cable.I have since purchased another Canon PowerShot SX50 HS.

Reviews.Title: Camera is fine, accoutrements need improvement
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: The extra battery and 32GB chip are fine. The camera case should be a Canon case, not a nondescript make; the small tripod should be replaced by a much more useful HDMI cable 100 to supplement the neat SD/SDHC/ SD reader/writer USB drive.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX50
Reviews.Author: Coffee Man
Reviews.Content: I have had a Canon PowerShort ELPH for over 6 years and have generally been pleased with it. However, it is an older model and doesn't have image stabilization and the zoom feature is really not very good. So, I began looking for a camera that I could trust to take great pictures from all distances and in all conditions. For me, this is the camera. I have enjoyed learning all the features, but even if I choose a simple point and shoot, the pictures are terrific. I can't wait to take this to the lake and on an overseas trip we are planning. Good battery life, compact enough, good software included, and a pretty good case is included in the package. Overall, I am very pleased with this camera and the accessories that came with it.

Reviews.Title: you need special USB cable
Reviews.Author: Victor L. Pillow
Reviews.Content: You need to buy a USB cable separately to connect the camera to your computer and interface with the software disc included.  You need Cannon Interface Cable IFC-400PCU or a USB cable with Mini B camera end for this camera.  A micro USB from the electronics store does not work.  The camera nor this kit comes with the cable so I suggest you order one when and if you order the camera so you do not have to go back on amazon and order it after you get the camera, like I just had to do after driving to two different stores and then coming home with a cable that does not work.  Everything else you need comes with the camera or the kit.  The package was sent to me by Fedex.  FYI, the mini tripod is tiny even by mini standards and does not hold the weight of the camera, but I think the kit is worth the extra money.  The camera comes new in a canon box with neck strap, software disc, battery, and battery charger.  The kit comes with a second battery, 32GB SD memory card, a card reader, camera bag, cleaning kit, and the super mini tripod.

Reviews.Title: Almost as good as a DSLR--and in some ways better
Reviews.Author: Joanna Daneman
Reviews.Content: This is a "point-and-shoot" or a fixed-lens digital camera. In some ways, it is almost better than a digital "single-lens-reflex" or the kind of camera where you can change lenses. This is because the 50x optical zoom lens on the Powershot goes from a the 35mm equivalent of wide-angle 24mm to telephoto of 1200mm which is a huge range of focal lengths. ( 4.3mm to 215.0mm.) You are going from wide for landscape and group shots to zooming in great distances (wildlife, moon, sports closeups from the stands.)If you want a camera to do everything, and not have to lug equipment, this is light and versatile. A few not-great things--the LCD screen is a lower resolution than I'd like. However the lens is so wide-ranging that if you can only take one, lightweight camera, this is quite the choice. You can get more Megapixels from other models of Powershot like the SX170 and you can get WiFi which this DOESN'T have in other models like the PowerShot SX510 HS. But this is a good choice for quick shots at any distance. Used, these run about two-fifty or three hundred. New, unrefurbished around four-twenty-nine.This is my choice for a grab-and-go and do-all camera, where 12MP of resolution are a good trade-off for lugging a DSLR and all the gear. Plus you're more likely to be able to handhold shots that would require a tripod with heavier cameras--however, I'd add at least a full tripod (like the Ravelli ) for situations where handholding won't work.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Andrew Griffith
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it.  She was surprised.  Big step up for her from a point and click.  She has expanded her range of subject matter.  Great for shooting snowy owls.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: C. Storr
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this camera and I fell in love with it. I was thinking about getting a DSLR camera and did some price checking did not want to get into the lens changing thing and I am not a photographer, so this camera was idea for what I needed. Takes excellent picture with great details. My first shots of a lizard and mango, when I looked at the pictures they were excellent. And this is from a first timer using an so what expensive camera. This camera has all the bells and whistles. It's a learning crave for me. The package deal was excellent, cost me $429, but the price goes up and down. Came with the strap, extra battery, mini tripod, card reader, cleaning kit, and camera bag. The camera bag is an extract fit for the camera. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good basic camera for the novice.
Reviews.Author: Movie lover
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera and has a variety of settings, most of which I can't figure out yet how to use. A good printed manual would have been nice to have. The Pros  for the SX50 are the variety of options included for those who are savvy enough to use the manual settings, special filters, etc. The Cons are that it is complicated to change settings. But the biggest issue I have with it is the location of the buttons on the back. I seem to press them with my hand every time I start to shoot. I'm constantly turning on the self timer by accident. Also, the camera bag arrived with a broken zipper and although I called Beach camera twice and was told I'd get a replacement, I never got it. That's whom it was shipped from. All in all, I like it and the photos are good quality. I like that the LCD screen can be swiveled around and placed flat against the back, or closed and the viewfinde used. I also like the one-button video recording.

Reviews.Title: Most functional camera
Reviews.Author: DBoh2
Reviews.Content: For those who enjoy taking pictures, but also have the ability to zoom in on your subject, this is the camera for you. I have been a camera buff for 50+ years, but limit my purchases to under $500, and this camera fits my pocket book. I have taken the best pictures I have ever taken of the moon, and this camera was essential in that process. I recently took a zoom picture of a visiting "Red Tail Hawk," where you could count the feathers, and those large focused eyes......

Reviews.Title: Canon software won't work on my Mac
Reviews.Author: TimMd
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine and takes great close and extreme zoom pictures. The software supplied with the camera can not detect the camera. I have an older version of the software that can communicate with my old Canon SX10is but it can't detect the new camera either. After removing the old software, I installed the software bundle. I then connected the SX50 to my Macintosh and it could not detect the camera. I removed and installed from the supplied CD (twice) and from Canon's web site. It still won't work. I can use a Macintosh utility to connect to the camera and download pictures. Without the Canon software, I can't use the photo stitch feature to connect a series of stills. Oh well. I give the camera five stars but the software -1 star.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with great features!
Reviews.Author: Diane M. Ruzevich
Reviews.Content: Great Camera with features I did not even know it had  and love! Especially that it has a view finder and a tilting screen for viewing at all different angles!

Reviews.Title: Awesome super zoom Camera.
Reviews.Author: Luis Alfredo Hernandez
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome. its exactly that i spect . the bag is nice, additional battery and SD Memory too.The only reason for 4 stars is the usb memory card reader. its useless . in some computers show memory's content, in other computers it can not connect to memory.  When finally have access, the connection with the memory is interrupted over and over again.I have read the other users posts on memory card reader and was what i expected.. an useless memory card reader

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann
Reviews.Content: I've only had it for a few weeks, but I find it to be a great camera.  I bought it for the 50x optical zoom feature and it really brings things up close! The stabilizing feature keeps the video from looking shaky and photos also look great taken from a distance.The battery seems to hold a good charge ( I haven't recharged it yet),  although I've only taken slightly over 100 photos and short videos combined.  As some other reviewers stated, it's easy to hit the wrong buttons, because they are close together, but I'm sure in time I will get used to this.  I can't say anything bad about it---I really like this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: nicolás fanjul arguijo
Reviews.Content: This package is great. The tripod is small but the extra battery and the 32 gb memory is much needed. The SD card reader doesn't work quite good enough so I had to insert the card directly into my SD card slot on my laptop.Photos are great by default but I'm just starting to discover the many alternative and fun options this camara has. Great buy and great price! I received it in 2 days in New York. I was expecting to wait like 5!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Wvb
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Everything works well. The zoom lens works well and focuses well. It is a relatively slow lens which is a problem in low light conditions.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot, great camera
Reviews.Author: Karen L. Morschauser
Reviews.Content: We compared many cameras with similar features.  The canon had a better zoom for the wildlife I like to take photos of.  However, I wish they would send a CD video to learn the features, the user manual is almost 300 pages and you do need to connect the camera to a computer, there was no adapter to connect to a computer.  Great camera

Reviews.Title: Most bang for the buck!!
Reviews.Author: Kicking coach
Reviews.Content: After having purchased and owned several different brands. I have to say, the Canon Powershot Sx50 is the best and easiest digital camera, for the price out there. Very pleased and satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value!
Reviews.Author: moybella
Reviews.Content: I checked out the competition thoroughly before choosing the SX50.  Nothing so far to make me regret my choice - everything I expected and more.

Reviews.Title: An amazing camera
Reviews.Author: D. Heatherly "Family Man"
Reviews.Content: I just returned from Europe and found this camera to be amazing.  Unbelievable zoom...I had a lot of fun and took some great pictures.  I  Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Meagan Malcom
Reviews.Content: I love this camera not to mention the fact that it comes with all the accessories you could want the tripod is small but still works well.

Reviews.Title: A lot to learn if you've been in "auto" mode but it's very nice!
Reviews.Author: diana
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the long zoom and the PowerShot XS50 HS does not disappoint. After tweaking the diopter adjustment I can see very clearly through the viewfinder with or without my glasses. It beats trying to see a sun washed out screen display! I use the viewfinder a lot more than the screen so it was a major factor in my satisfaction with this camera, after the long zoom.I admit I am a point and shoot person, always in auto mode with various scenes with my previous camera despite it having many of the same manual controls as this camera. With the help of some videos at YouTube by MWESTPhotography, I'm trying out the user controlled settings at last.  It takes a little more effort to get things to frame the right object and focus at full optical zoom with it being so very long, but it works fine with the camera on my cheap tripod; at least on days with little wind.It's nice I could just pick this camera up and use it without any difficulty. The menus are not confusing nor are the controls despite them being a little different from other cameras I've used.  That might not have been true if I had not used a camera with similar features; I remember how overwhelmed I was with my old camera at first.There is a lot of noise when taking videos in the wind; the microphone picks it up all too well.  That's the only negative I have to report so far.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Lynn S. Ross "Lynn"
Reviews.Content: I have been busy learning all the things this camera can do. So far I am taking great action shots and great macro shots. I have a lot more to learn. It has many features.The zoom is amazing. The action tracking is amazing too. I caught my grandson in midair running the bases at his game. It was very clear. I also caught water drops from a sprinkler as the kids were running through it.

Reviews.Title: Video and pictures
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I Love Love Love this camera. Recently too it to Ireland it was a great space saver to know have to pack both a camera and a video recorder

Reviews.Title: Great light-weight camera
Reviews.Author: Janet Eshenroder "jan123"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Nikon Coolpix P510. Sometimes, when traveling on planes for long vacations, or on long field trips with iffy weather, I prefer carrying a light-weight camera instead of twenty + pounds of more expensive equipment. For serious macro shots, I resort to my tripod and macro setup, but still sling a zoom camera across one shoulder to grab non-macro shots that may pop up while I'm out in the field. I was fairly happy with my Nikon but the Canon Powershot out-performed it, both on distant and macro shots. I'm still learning my way around the camera but already can see this will be my preferred travel camera.

Reviews.Title: Complicated.
Reviews.Author: john pizzuto
Reviews.Content: It would be nice to have an additional manuel to explain all the features. Haveing to flip back and forth to see how to operate this cvamera makes it inconvenient. Operation and features are numerous and will take some time to figure it out. Maybe too complicated for me. Still need additional time to explore the camera .

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 50x Wide-Angle Optical...
Reviews.Author: Christine A. Ritchie
Reviews.Content: This camera will be perfect for my upcoming trips, because of the zoom capablities all in one lense. My SLR is great but a bit bulky when travelling with more than one lens and too expensive to lose or drop when hiking,etc. I need to spend more time getting to know it but I am sure it will meet my expectations as I have other Canon products and am very happy with them.

Reviews.Title: Nice but
Reviews.Author: RSAPhotos
Reviews.Content: image quality, speed, battery life and general feel is 5 star, the record button for video knocks the overall down to a 4 though, have to be very aware of where your thumb is or your recording without wanting to

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: While just getting into using this camera, I am very pleased.  Experts rated it highly and it is a little smaller and lighter than others.  The video and microphone are surprisingly good.  I wanted this camera for closeups of wildlife and action shots mostly of our grandchild and I am pleased with this as well.It is a handful though smaller that the EOS and such so there is some bulk to contend with.  So I will keep my Canon Powershot Elf which is very good as well and fits in a pocket.

Reviews.Title: Delivers on performance as described in the totality of the reviews (126 and counting).
Reviews.Author: gordy
Reviews.Content: I knew what to expect of the purchase because the number of reviews detailed the issues.  The zoom  is the mark on this product.  Panoramas need better explanations and software.  As a single source travel camera, and a bit more, it does not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Bought this camera because of the excellent photos taken by a friend, and I was not disappointed!
Reviews.Author: LaurelindaJT
Reviews.Content: Still learning the various functions, but I have been able to take shots of the full moon (hand-held, no less) that look like they were taken through a telescope!  And then, in the close-up arena, my shots of flowers at close range are also incredible.  I am amazed at the versatility this camera provides.  The only thing I wish it had was Wifi capability, but I bought a kit that included a 32Gb SD card as well as a USB reader for the card that makes uploading to the computer a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Gerald Wendel
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for my son and his wife.  I purchased this camera for my son and daughter-in-law.Very good pics!  Awesome zoom.

Reviews.Title: Happy I got it!
Reviews.Author: VERONICA LUZ GRANADO
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert in semipro cameras. Only owned simple aim and shoot cameras. We got this camera to take photos while in nature tours and especially because of the zoom. The zoom worked amazingly well. The photos are really nice. I cannot give more technical insights since I don't have experience in this field as mentioned before. The rest of the package is OK: tripod not for this camera, so I use it for my smaller cameras; the case has a good size, though I 'd prefer it had some internal zipped pocket to keep things from falling when opening the bag.

Reviews.Title: Really like this camera, wish I bought it a year ago.
Reviews.Author: PAUL D MILLS
Reviews.Content: This is the first good camera I purchased and so far I love it.  The pictures are better than any other camera I owned.

Reviews.Title: Amazing zoom!
Reviews.Author: DeeGee
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  The only disappointment is when I zoom out with the digital zoom (in excess of the 50x optical zoom) the picture isn't as good of quality.  BUT, that might change once I learn how to use all the settings I have.  It's a fun camera and it's got lots of different settings to "play with".  Just be sure to use a tripod as often as possible when you do use the full zoom so the picture will be perfect.  Oh, and I got unbelievable shots of the full moon.  The picture showed detail like I've never seen before with any of my past cameras.  You will not regret getting this camera!

Reviews.Title: incredible moon shots
Reviews.Author: asiam
Reviews.Content: i am so happy with this camera! i got to take some incredible shots of the blood moon we had a fews ago! some of the stuff that came with is junk but for the same price you can get this one with bundle so i said why not.

Reviews.Title: skip the accessory pack
Reviews.Author: Jordan R.
Reviews.Content: The camera is as nice as expected. The accessory pack however was merely a cheap starter pack and did not live up to expectations.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera, great price and great delivery time.
Reviews.Author: lonewolf-1
Reviews.Content: Had my doubts about this item but after reading a lot of reviews and all of them being very positive I decided to go for it.Well I am not disappointed, the zoom is phenomenal the quality of the photos are excellent compared to other manufacturers of cameras at a higher price. I've had those and was not impressed. For my money you can't get a better photograph with any other camera than this model.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera and very nice bundle by Beach Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Chicago John "Rirelguvat vf rinarfprag."
Reviews.Content: I think the reviews of the camera speak for themselves, and I'll get back to that issue after I've had a chance to use it for a few months.But this review is about the bundle you get with no extra charge from Beach.  Others have dissed it, but I think it deserves five stars.  The SD card I received was a 32 MB Sony 40 mb/s class 10.  The little tripod and cleaning kit fit nicely in the very nice little zippered bag they give you with the Beach Camera logo on it.  You can move the velcro edge divider over to accomodate the camera and in the adjacent space available you can put the extra battery pack with terminal cover and the nice little cleaning kit they give you complete with Q-tips, cleaning solution, and a microfiber cloth.  On the outside end there is an elastic pouch that would be suitable to hold your lens cover, filter, etc.  You could clip the small tripod desk mount on somewhere if you think you might need it.I had a small case I used to use with my Pentax K100D for street shots, but this little case they provided will work perfectly for the Canon X50 HS and a bit of extras.  The tripod might find use in setting the camera on top of a table or perhaps on the partially rolled down window of a car, and it's small enough that who's going to complain??  It has a clip on it for a pocket.The extra battery is a great add-on and, yes, it does come with a Canon warranty card.Nice little Kit, Beach Camera!! I think Beach Camera really hit a home run: I felt I they gave me a nice little extra value I hadn't counted upon and which definitely exceeded my expectations.In a month or two I'll report on my experience with the camera itself as one who is "downgrading" from a Pentax K-5 with about $3K in glass to have something I can always have with me with the range this SX50 has.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Leonardo
Reviews.Content: Telephoto works nice.  Control buttons in wrong place on camera body.  Tripod is a joke.  Don't need to buy extra batteries.  But overall, a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Victor Cortese
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, who really wanted an upgraded camera.  This has surpassed her exectations and th epictures are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Love the product and seller
Reviews.Author: pankaj
Reviews.Content: Camera is very good and picture quality is superb. I am very happy with quality of picture.I also want to say thanks to beachcamera seller. they are really excellent. I have issue with battery and they replaced it even after 50 days. Thank u so much.

Reviews.Title: Grate pictures
Reviews.Author: Mike Poppie
Reviews.Content: I haven,t taken many pictures with so far but what i have taken has been better than expected,there is something i do not like with this camera and that is the function buttons right next to the thumb hold on back, i keep pushing the buttons unintentionally for me they are to close to  thumb hold other than that i really like the camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: lindaltodd
Reviews.Content: I have reviewed this before but here goes again. It is a nice camera. My son bought one but his has extra lenses - mine didn't have that. but it did have an extra battery. It does a great job of taking photos.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Powershot SX50 HS: Excellent Camera in this category/Price
Reviews.Author: Sheikh Al Harun Islam
Reviews.Content: I bought Cannon Powershot SX 50 HS for family use. Excellent performance. Easy to take picture, many differnt features. Very good Camera at this category/price range.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a rookie
Reviews.Author: C Arrick Stephens
Reviews.Content: great quality pictures.  as always, Canon is easy to operate.  the purchase package was perfect for what I needed.  My professional photographer friend likes it too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Non-SLR Canon SX50
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Replaces the Panasonic Super ZoomBetter Fast Object Tracking and CaptureFurther Flash DistanceNeed Two Batteries for extra drain fromconstant auto focus features

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Joel A. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Item shipped very quickly. Camera is incredible.  I would recommend purchasing from this place to anyone. I am very happy

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Pictured!!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia S. Cahill
Reviews.Content: Gave this camera to our 23 year old daughter for Christmas.  Shr is goimg ln a safsri in thr Spring.  She haf it ip snd running quickly and took pictures all day.  Next morning she presented us all with fabulous pics she had taken of the festivities.  Rapid fire is amazing along with Zoom!!

Reviews.Title: cannon SX 50 Camera review
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great pictures and easy to use on auto. Multiple features that I am still learning to use. Owners manual is not as thorough as videos on YouTube regarding custom settings.

Reviews.Title: Not ready to rate.
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. May
Reviews.Content: this does a lot of things and the directions are so poor.  I'll get through them slowly not ready to rate the camera yet.  Still taking pictures with auto and "P".  I recommend that everyone buy the "Canon Power shot sx50 Digital Csamera Cheatsheet"  for this camera by PhotoBurt.  I think tripod or monopod will be necessary to take good pictures with the zoom fully extended.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Nerly Ferreira Reis
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures. I am still learning all of its features. Looks like it will be a great camera. .

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: Arrived ahead of time & packaged very securely. All items advertised were included in package and intact.  As much as you pay for this item, you would hope it would be packaged professionally, & it was ~ a VERY nice & welcomed surprise. A lot of places just throw it in a box & send with no care as to the end result. Will definitely order from this place again the next time there's something i cant live without. i know it'll be fast & well protected.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY!
Reviews.Author: N. Jackson "Fab Doll"
Reviews.Content: I love this cam. I am obsessed with Canon products. I just wish I would have learned about cameras before I purchased it. I am in the process of studying photography and when I purchased this camera I had NO idea what the difference between a powershot and dslr was (i know that sounds crazy) but YES. O well I will get to pass it down to my daughter when she starts traveling for field trips and dance competitions.Thanks,NJ

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot Package
Reviews.Author: Joseph Brenner
Reviews.Content: I had been watching prices and offers on this camera for a few months.  Yours was the best one posted so I bought one.  Looks like it will be a great camera.Joe Brenner

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Zoom.
Reviews.Author: munir zaman
Reviews.Content: It's a good product.  I m enjoying this product. I suggest others to buy this product. The seller is also good. Shipment is also very fast. I rate 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase
Reviews.Author: Ruth Richman
Reviews.Content: For someone who is a beginner I must say the results are awesome. Still have lots to learn but am looking forward to it

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: ignacio
Reviews.Content: I use the camera to take family pictures and it works perfectx50 zoom is excellent for portraitsfast shipping and  great camerathanks!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Jerry Carden
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for someone who asked for it specifically.  It is everything that was expected by the recipient.

Reviews.Title: Canon SX50 Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Itchy_brother"
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these cameras, wife and I got one for each other for Christmas.Ya know what? We love the camera to bits. It has great zoom, easy to use and takes really nice pictures, including some nice closeups. We are still in a learning curve with the closeups but hanging in there. So far my only con is that I have not found a way to focus the camera manually - I mean- how can a person really have manual control without that? I have not read the entire manual yet so maybe the answer is still ahead for me. We are very with the camera and having a lot of fun shooting pic of the Grandbabies.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS
Reviews.Author: Photo Belle "Photo belle"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband and he loves it.  If it is not hazy in the atmosphere the shots are wonderful.  As for operation, you would have to ask him.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 50x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom Super Bundle W/ 32 GB Secure Digital (SDHC) Mem. Card, Dig Pro Case SD USB 2.0 Card Reader, BP 1150
